name: Be Our Guest
summary:
Have you ever found yourself exhausted and confused by the hustle and bustle of corporate life in the big city?

Wouldn’t it be wonderful if there were a place you could just relax and unwind, maybe have a nice cup of coffee or a snack, in the company of a variety of attentive pink-feathered waterfowl (and also Kenneth)?

Need an opportunity to just hang out and be unafraid to be yourself?

If the answer to any of this is no, then it should be yes, and if the answer to any of this is yes, then you’re welcome to Be Our Guest at the Matinee Cabaret, a fun and inviting café, just a little off the beaten path, and with live entertainment too! Pop in for the grand opening in this charming visual mini-novel featuring original, dynamic sprite-work and colorful backgrounds for the various locations in the café, where you can meet and chat up the employees through their voice-acted branching dialogue trees. Order a drink, make a friend, solve a dilemma, and preview what the Matinee Cabaret has in store!
